Tabs_settings_DeleteAllSessionsConfirm_C: All your conversation and message data will be cleared. This action is irreversible.
Tabs_settings_DeleteAccountConfirm_Conte: All your data will be reset, and all conversations and settings will be cleared. This action is irreversible.
Tabs_settings_Basic_4_Desc: Generate a suitable conversation title based on first request.
Tabs_settings_Model_1_Desc: A larger value makes the more random output.
Tabs_settings_Model_2_Desc: Maximum number of tokens used for a single response.
Tabs_settings_Model_3_Desc: A larger value increases the likelihood to talk about new topics.
Tabs_settings_Model_4_Desc: A larger value decreases the likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim.
Tabs_settings_Model_5_Desc: The number of historical messages carried with each request.
Tabs_settings_Model_6_Desc: Whether the request include quick command messages for campus services.
Tabs_settings_Model_7_Desc: Whether the request include multiple generated results for the same prompt. If disabled, only the last generated result for the same prompt will be included in the request.
Tabs_settings_Model_8_Desc: Whether request the model to return a more enthusiastic response in the system prompt. If enabled, more tokens will be consumed.
Tabs_settings_Risky_1_Desc: Clear all conversations and message data.
Tabs_settings_Risky_2_Desc: All data, conversations and settings of the account will be removed.
